title.title: Organic Bamboo Lyocell Quilted Sham Set

content.value: Our bamboo sham set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties. Set includes two shams.

shopifyProduct.title: Organic Bamboo Lyocell Quilted Sham Set

content.value: The super soft quilt set you've always dreamed of. Our mid-weight bamboo quilt set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties - perfect for year-round comfort. Set includes quilt and two shams.

The super soft quilt you've always dreamed of. Our mid-weight bamboo quilt is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties - perfect for year-round comfort.

Our organic bamboo bed sheets are crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties that keep you comfortable all night long.

Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen quilted sham set offers year-round luxury that feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time. Set includes two shams.

Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen quilt is the perfect year-round layer that feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time. Set includes quilt and two shams.

Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen quilt is the perfect year-round layer and feels as good as it looks. Pre-washed for superior softness and a perfectly lived-in vibe, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time.

Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen crib quilt offers year-round comfort for your little one. Pre-washed for superior softness, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time.

Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen crib sheet offers year-round comfort for your little one. Pre-washed for superior softness, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time. Set includes 2 fitted crib sheets.

Expertly crafted from the finest European flax, our linen napkins are equally soft and functional. The classic design and texture makes these napkins well suited for formal gatherings or casual nights at home.

Beauty and function merge in our collection of Japanese Damascus steel knives. Crafted of the highest quality Japanese VG10 steel and covered in Damascus steel - this knife collection delivers precise cuts and the optimum edge retention. Prices range from 39.90-79.90 for a single knife - over 50% less than other leading premium brands.

shopifyProduct.title: South Sea Pearl and Diamond Earrings

content.value: A classic design meets optimal performance in our collection of Japanese high-carbon steels knives.  Featuring premium Japanese AUS-10 stainless steel, our knives offer both durability and the ultimate sharpness. Prices range from 19.90-39.90 for a single knife - over 50% less than other leading premium brands.
